translated: “Mañjuśrī, to the east of this buddhafield, past as many buddhafields as there are sands in seven Gaṅgā rivers, in the world system Endowed with Jewels, the tathāgata, the arhat, the perfectly awakened one, the one with perfect wisdom and conduct, the sugata, the knower of the world, the unsurpassable guide who tames beings, the teacher of gods and humans, the buddha, the bhagavān named Jewel Moon and Lotus Ornament, Skillful Hero Splendor King, resides, present, alive, and teaching the Dharma.

analyzed: kun dga' bo / gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po da'i yon tan brjod par khyod dad dam /

analyzed: yang na khyod /
translated: Or do you

analyzed: the tshom za ba med dam /
translated: Do you have any doubts, uncertainties, or skepticism about this neuter domain of the buddhas?”

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Ānanda said to the Blessed One:

analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams la / yid gnyis sam; som nyi 'am /

analyzed: the tshom 'tshal ba ma mchis so //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so //

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos nas de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te /

analyzed: spong bas yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi sman pa dang / mi bde ba dang / rnam par ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will reject it, and for a long time they will be harmed, be unwell, be unhappy, and fall.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no //
translated: it is impossible and there is no chance that someone who has heard the name of that thus-gone one will go to the lower realms.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka'o //
translated: the domain of the buddhas is difficult to believe.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: khyod dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par blta'o //
translated: you should see that your faith and belief is due to the power of the thus-gone ones.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no //

translated: Except for the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are only one birth away from awakening, this is not the stage of all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda!

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda!

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni tshad med do //
translated: The bodhisattva conduct of that blessed Tathāgata Bhaiṣajya-guru-vaiḍūrya-prabha, the King, is immeasurable.

original: thabs la mkhas pa yang tshad med do //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa yang tshad med do //

original: smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad med do //
analyzed: smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad med do //

analyzed: nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa 'am /

translated: However, it is not possible to understand the extent of the special past aspirations of that blessed tathāgata King of Medicine Bhaiṣajya-guru-vaiḍūrya-prabha.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing bkres pa dang / skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni skabs /

original: 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs /
analyzed: 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs /

analyzed: mdza' @410b bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams du ba rnams kyis ni bskor /

analyzed: gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te /

translated: Though his body is lying here, his consciousness is being led before the Dharma King Yama.

analyzed: mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa de dag thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba 'am /
translated: The god who was born together with that man and has followed him around has written down all the virtuous and nonvirtuous actions he has done and presented them to the Dharma King Yama, and the Dharma King Yama has questioned and examined him about them.

analyzed: mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la gang dag nad pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyi na
translated: “Those who, for the sake of the sick person, take refuge in the Blessed One, the thus-gone, the worthy one, the perfect Buddha King of the Medicine of the Lapis Lazuli Radiance, and make offerings in this way

analyzed: de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyi 'tshal ba'i gnas der mchis te /
translated: will have their consciousness return, and they will return to the place where they were, as if they had woken up from a dream.

original: yang na ni gdugs bdun /
analyzed: yang na ni gdugs bdun /

original: yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig /
analyzed: yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig /

original: yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga /
analyzed: yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga /

analyzed: yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la /

analyzed: de la dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: They will then perceive the ripening of their virtuous and nonvirtuous actions with their own eyes.

analyzed: srog gi slad du yang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do //

analyzed: de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o //
translated: should make offerings to that Tathāgata.

analyzed: @411a *// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Ānanda said to the bodhisattva Trāṇamukta:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la ji ltar mchod par bya /

original: byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa /
translated: ” The bodhisattva Trāṇamukta said:

original: btsun pa kun dga' bo /
analyzed: btsun pa kun dga' bo /
translated: “Venerable Ānanda,

original: gang dag nad chen po las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis /
analyzed: gang dag nad chen po las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis /
translated: those who wish to be completely cured of great illness

translated: They should make offerings to the community of monks of food, drink, and all necessities to the best of their ability,🔽and they should recite this dhāraṇī seven times a day and seven times a night.

translated: Three times a day and three times a night one should bring to mind the name of that bhagavat, the Tathāgata King Bhaiṣajya-guru-vaiḍūrya-prabha.

analyzed: mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o //

analyzed: sku gzugs bdun bya'o //

analyzed: sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar yang mar me bdun bdun bzhag go /

analyzed: mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du bya ste /

analyzed: ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o //
translated: In this way, for forty-nine days, the butter lamps should not be allowed to go out.

analyzed: tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o //

original: btsun pa kun dga' bo /
analyzed: btsun pa kun dga' bo /
